key.name: smooth-scrolling
key.description: This key determines whether webkit will enable smooth scrolling support, which can end up being resource intensive.

key.name: page-cache
key.description: This key determines whether webkit will enable page caching, which can end up being resource intensive.

key.name: javascript
key.description: This key determines whether webkit will enable javascript support.

key.name: site-quirks
key.description: This key determines whether webkit will enable site specific quirks, that can enhance the experience on given sites in exchange of non standard behaviour.

key.name: cookie-policy
key.description: This key determines the cookie policy of the browser. 0 = Accept all cookies, always. 1 = Block all cookies, always. 2 = Block all cookies not coming from the main site.

key.name: homepage
key.description: This key determines which web will be opened for new tabs and startup.

key.name: force-https
key.description: This key determines whether the browser will only load and interact with URLs and services featuring the HTTPS protocol.

key.name: insecure-content
key.description: This key determines whether the browser will allow insecure content, that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites.
